attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All new buildings to have Solar Panels: withold planning for new builds without this form of energy.

Older properties being converted should also be fitted with solar panels.  These properties should be exempted from VAT on panels.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
